Level 34
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher Card & Adventure Video Games: Monster Rancher Explorer Archive (Game Boy Color): Strategy: Level 34
By Y.K. TAN on Saturday, May 29, 2004 - 11:42 pm:

Stage 34

When you enter the stage, move left and destroy those boxes. If the Octopus thingy tries to come near you, just jump over him(they have seriously short lifespan.) If they are about to get you when the second bunch come, make full use of the duck doll and make your way to the left. Stand on the leftern block and destroy that one particular box so when the octopus on the left lands, you can just create a box and jump up to get the key. Make boxes till you reach the top leftern block, make sure you destroy boxes to make gaps in case any of the octopuses reach you. Make your way to the right and remember, must leave gaps for octopus and jump all the way up, but be careful of the ducken. Dodge his shots by placing a box and jump up to victory.
